title: Update Quick Actions: replace “Book Appointment” with “Log Avoid”

requirements.text: In the Home Dashboard "Quick Actions" section, remove the "Book Appointment" tile and replace it with a tile labeled "Log Avoid" (English text). Keep the tile in the same grid position and ensure clicking it performs a safe placeholder action (e.g., a console log) without navigating to a non-existent route.

quotes: In Quick action can you remove book appointment & replace to log Avoid

acceptanceCriteria: On /home, the Quick Actions grid no longer shows a tile labeled "Book Appointment".
On /home, the Quick Actions grid shows a tile labeled exactly "Log Avoid".
Clicking "Log Avoid" does not throw errors and does not navigate away from the page unless a valid route is implemented.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Implementing an appointment booking flow or appointment-related pages/routes.
Implementing persistence or backend support for the new "Log Avoid" action.
